attributes.action: Abolish road tax and road priceing plan instead put 6 pence on a litre of fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolish road tax and road pricing plan instead put 6 pence on a litre of fuel that way the people who use the roads pay for them. And have 2 discs in the windscreen one for insurance, and one for mot, that way we all know if a vehicle is legal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
